metadata.name: AWS S3 Bucket Versioning Disable
metadata.comment: Detects when S3 bucket versioning is disabled. Threat actors use this technique during AWS ransomware incidents prior to deleting S3 objects.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM datastore_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('s3.amazonaws.com') AND lower(api.operation) = lower('putbucketversioning') AND contains(lower(api.request.data), lower('suspended')))

output.summary: Detects when S3 bucket versioning is disabled. Threat actors use this technique during AWS ransomware incidents prior to deleting S3 objects.

metadata.objective: False positive: AWS administrator legitimately disabling bucket versioning Reference: https://invictus-ir.medium.com/ransomware-in-the-cloud-7f14805bbe82
